subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Aaron Ekblad, an 18-year-old defenseman in the Ontario Hockey League, is ranked by some as the No. 2 prospect in this weekend’s N.H.L. draft.
snippet: Aaron Ekblad, an 18-year-old defenseman in the Ontario Hockey League, is ranked by some as the No. 2 prospect in this weekend’s N.H.L. draft.
